definition: to be hit by a gun/shot
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
(lit.) to get shot even when lying down/(fig.) to get unjustly ridiculed, attacked, implicated in sth etc while just being present (Internet slang)/abbr. to 躺槍|躺枪[tang3 qiang1]

sentences.english: What was he doing when he got shot?
sentences.chinese: 他中槍的時候在幹什麼？

sentences.english: There were reports last night that security forces had surrounded the hospital where he died.
sentences.chinese: 但安全部隊已經包圍了他中槍處附近的醫院。

sentences.english: See Yu Zhixin shot in the ground, woomi jumped to his rickshaw.
sentences.chinese: 看到餘志鑫中槍倒地，友美跳下黃包車奔向他。

sentences.english: Blair: You should have told me you got shot.
sentences.chinese: 你應該告訴我你中槍了。

sentences.english: And slights the law is " is hit dies ".
sentences.chinese: 其中一個玩法就是“中槍死”。

sentences.english: Witnesses said that Clark was handcuffed when he was shot in the head.
sentences.chinese: 據目擊者稱，克拉克頭部中槍時雙手戴着手銬。

sentences.english: Master Sheng also injured in the gun, Zhong Hao carrying his father a way to escape.
sentences.chinese: 盛班主也中槍受傷，忠豪揹着父親一路逃跑。

sentences.english: But soon after, ZhuLiSi in a shot in the head during Saturday, specifically die.
sentences.chinese: 但是不久之後，朱麗斯就在一次陌頭火拼中中槍死去。

sentences.english: As people emerged from their homes they were either hacked to death or shot.
sentences.chinese: 人們從家裏出來，有的被砍死，有的中槍。

sentences.english: A pastor was shot through the heart while giving a sermon.
sentences.chinese: 一名牧師在佈道時中槍，子彈穿心而過。

sentences.english: Dimitrov, who died aged 31, had the mobile with him when he was shot while eating out with a model.
sentences.chinese: 他當時31歲，中槍時正帶着他的手機，和模特喫飯。

sentences.english: When I got shot, I was supposedly never going to walk properly again.
sentences.chinese: 我中槍以後，覺得自己再也不能正常走路了。

definition: to open fire/to shoot a gun
gunman/sharpshooter/sb who takes an exam for sb else/sb who produces a piece of work for sb else to pass off as their own
to order the arrest of sb as criminal/to list as wanted
